member.name: IDXGIFactory7.RegisterAdaptersChangedEvent
member.summary: Registers to receive notification of changes whenever the adapter enumeration state changes.
member.param: A handle to the event object.

member.returns: Returns S_OK if successful; an error code otherwise.
